summary: A saved game of a character that looks like Mikasa Ackerman.
descriptionHtml:
This is a attack on titan related saved game with the character Mikasa Ackerman. Her eyes are not the right colour because there was an issue with the amount of choices I got. You can edit in showracemenu.

Download instructions:
Download the file and open the saved game. Depending on the saved game you choose you might need alternative start, otherwise your character will start out in whiterun.
Load the save, use shadowracemenu and then press F5 to save the face, after that press F9 to apply it.
Tip: Only use for ningheim for it to work properly.
Required:
Sevenbase body replacer. Ningheim race. Coverwomen. Â SG female eyebrows. SG female textures renewal. Apachii sky hair. (Leave a comment if the saved game doesn't work. :P)
author: Mugiwara
